name: Snail Forth!
description:
Help Lady Sophia Slimesworth on her quest for the perfect lettuce! 

This is my entry to a game by its cover jam 2019, and my first pico-8 creation! The game is based on this famicase by Ludonaut!

i'll polish and tweak some stuff later this week, maybe even add some musics!

press x to boost, z to brake!

Set sail and   h o r m f   t h a t   c r o n c h
